name: Easy-Breezy Nest
description: A charming oval-shaped gazebo constructed of White Chestnut Oak Wood and metal components, topped with dragon-nest ornaments, scattered throughout the "Easybreeze Holiday Resort." Allegedly the creation of a foreign architect, it was designed to serve as a shared resting space for both Asha and humans. The architect mistakenly understood "Asha" to be a dragon's nickname and thus infused the design with draconic elements. The result? A structure beloved by Asha and tourists alike, now a permanent icon of the resort.
